name: Underground Cove
description:
In this game you are a robot who adventures inside a cave because of a he feels a strange calling towards it. 

This game was made using unity and by the help of all these contributors 

Art: Dario Enriquez Remaxim, RottingPixels, DkuCook, Cagil Ozdemirag, E's Pixel Art Shop, Aryonc, Hero of Allacrost, Warren Clark Lanea Zimmerman, Jesse M Ansimuz, OddPotateGift, Kenney.nl, GoBusto

Music: Hunter Jauregui, Marcelo Fernandez, Cynic Music, Johnathan Shaw, Fantasy Musica, Zander Noriega, Inspector J, SetUni Man Mega Pixel Music, Luke Rust, Joth, Joseph Gilbert

TO PLAY: Right click and extract the file UNDERGROUND COVE then once extracted click on Platformer Movement
